cards.title: Acid Arrow
cards.description: Shoot a green acid arrow at a target, dealing 4d4 acid damage upon hit and 2d4 at end of its next turn. On miss, target takes half initial damage and no damage at end of its next turn.

cards.title: Acid Splash
cards.description: Hurl acid bubble at one target or two within 5 feet. Dex save or take 1d6 acid damage, scaling to 4d6 at higher levels.

cards.title: Aid
cards.description: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.

cards.title: Alarm
cards.description: Alarm spell creates a 20-foot cube alerting you if creatures touch/enter area. Choose who doesn't trigger it. Mental alert within 1 mile pings your mind; audible option rings a hand bell for 10 seconds within 60 feet.

cards.title: Alter Self
cards.description: Polymorph spell: Choose Aquatic Adaptation for underwater breathing and swimming, Change Appearance for cosmetic transformations, or Natural Weapons for magical unarmed strikes dealing 1d6 damage with +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls. Can switch options with an action.

cards.title: Animal Friendship
cards.description: Charm a beast to believe you mean no harm. Requires the beast to see and hear you, with 4 or lower Intelligence. They make a Wisdom save or are charmed. Ends if you or allies harm them.

cards.title: Animal Messenger
cards.description: Using a Tiny beast as a messenger, deliver a 25-word message to a specified recipient at a known location within range, with the messenger traveling up to 50 miles per day. If not delivered, the message is lost.

cards.title: Animal Shapes
cards.description: "Polymorph" spell transforms willing creatures into beasts CR 4 or lower, lasting until dispelled or hit points drop to 0. Retain alignment and mental stats, limited actions in beast form, gear melds with no benefit."

cards.title: Animate Dead
cards.description: Animate Dead: Turn bones or a corpse into a skeleton or zombie. Control up to 4 undead creatures within 60 feet for 24 hours with a bonus action each turn. Reassert control by recasting before 24 hours.

cards.title: Animate Objects
cards.description: Animate Objects animates up to ten objects, creating creatures under your control. Objects' size affects hit points, AC, and attacks. Objects follow your commands and defend themselves if no orders are given. Objects have limited Intelligence and blind beyond 30 feet. When reduced to 0 hit points...

cards.title: Antilife Shell
cards.description: Create a 10-foot radius barrier around you that moves as you do, preventing creatures (except undead and constructs) from passing through. Affected creatures can attack or cast spells through the barrier, but if you force them to move through it, the spell ends.

cards.title: Antimagic Field
cards.description: Create a 10-foot-radius antimagic sphere centered on you, suppressing spells, summoned creatures, and magic items within it. Targeted effects, areas of magic, spells, magic items, magical travel, creatures, and objects are all affected. Dispel Magic has no effect on the sphere.

cards.title: Antipathy/Sympathy
cards.description: This spell attracts or repels creatures within a 200-foot cube. Choose a creature type and create an aura of either antipathy or sympathy. Antipathy frightens creatures, forcing them to move away. Sympathy compels creatures to move toward or stay near the target. Creatures can make saves to end t...

cards.title: Arcane Eye
cards.description: Create an invisible eye that hovers, providing visual info with normal and darkvision within 30 feet. Move it up to 30 feet in any direction as an action, with no range limit but can't enter another plane. Can pass through openings as small as 1 inch.

cards.title: Arcane Hand
cards.description: Create a Large hand of force with AC 20 and HP equal to yours. Control hand's movements, 60ft range. Clenched Fist deals 4d8 force damage. Forceful Hand pushes target. Grasping Hand grapples and can crush for 2d6 + mod damage. Interposing Hand provides half cover and blocks movement based on Stre...

cards.title: Arcane Lock
cards.description: "Arcane Lock" locks a door, chest, or similar object, making it impassable except to designated creatures. A password can be set to temporarily unlock it. It increases the DC to break or pick locks by 10. Casting "Knock" suppresses it for 10 minutes.

cards.title: Arcane Sword
cards.description: Summon a force sword that deals 3d10 force damage on hit. Can move sword 20ft with bonus action to attack each turn.

cards.title: Arcanist'S Magic Aura
cards.description: Nystul's Magic Aura creates a false appearance for a touched creature or object, affecting divination spells. Choose False Aura to alter how it appears to detect magic, or Mask to change how it's detected by spells like Divine Sense. Illusions last until dispelled if cast daily for 30 days.

cards.title: Astral Projection
cards.description: Project astral bodies to the Astral Plane with up to 8 creatures, leaving unconscious bodies behind. Silver cord connects astral form to body. Travel through Astral Plane and portals to other planes. Physical body and possessions transported through cord. Damage to astral form doesn't affect body...

cards.title: Augury
cards.description: Casting the spell, you receive an omen from anotherworldly entity about the outcome of a specific course of action within 30 minutes. Omen can be Weal (good), Woe (bad), Weal and woe (both), or Nothing. Repeat casts increase chance of random results.

cards.title: Awaken
cards.description: "Awaken" spell: Touch Huge or smaller beast/plant with Int of 3 or less. Grants Int 10, ability to speak language known to caster. Awakened plants gain mobility and human-like senses. GM assigns stats. Charms target for 30 days or until harmed. Creature chooses to remain friendly based on treatment.

cards.title: Bane
cards.description: Choose up to three visible creatures for a Charisma saving throw. If they fail, they subtract a d4 from attack and saving throws while under the spell's effect.

cards.title: Banishment
cards.description: "Banishment" spell transports a visible creature to another plane with a charisma save. If native, sent to a harmless demiplane, incapacitated. Returns after 1 min unless the spell ends. Non-natives return to their home plane.

cards.title: Barkskin
cards.description: You touch a willing creature. Until the spell ends, the target's skin has a rough, bark-like appearance, and the target's AC can't be less than 16, regardless of what kind of armor it is wearing.

cards.title: Beacon Of Hope
cards.description: This spell bestows hope and vitality. Choose any number of creatures within range. For the duration, each target has advantage on wisdom saving throws and death saving throws, and regains the maximum number of hit points possible from any healing.

cards.title: Bestow Curse
cards.description: "Bestow Curse" - Spell curses a creature with various effects: disadvantage on ability checks/saves, disadvantage on attacks against caster, wasted action on failed save, extra necrotic damage from caster. GM can allow alternative curse effects, but no more powerful than default options.

cards.title: Black Tentacles
cards.description: Summon tentacles in a 20-ft square, turning it into difficult terrain. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the area make Dexterity saves or take 3d6 damage and get restrained. Restrained creatures can use an action to escape with a Str/Dex check against your spell save DC.

cards.title: Blade Barrier
cards.description: Create a 100ft long, 20ft high, 5ft thick wall of spinning blades. Provides three-quarters cover and is difficult terrain. Deals 6d10 slashing damage to creatures entering or starting their turn within, with a Dexterity save for half.

cards.title: Bless
cards.description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

cards.title: Blight
cards.description: Inflict Wounds: Choose a target within range, forcing a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 8d8 necrotic damage; half on a success. Doesn't affect undead/constructs. Plants make saving throw with disadvantage; non-creature plants wither and die without a save.

cards.title: Blindness/Deafness
cards.description: Choose a creature to make a constitution saving throw; if it fails, it's blinded or deafened. Target can save at end of each turn to end effect.

cards.title: Blink
cards.description: Vanish into the Ethereal Plane on a d20 roll of 11+. Return to a chosen space near your departure point when spell ends. Can see own plane in gray, limited vision, and interaction only with Ethereal Plane creatures.

cards.title: Blur
cards.description: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you. For the duration, any creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against you. An attacker is immune to this effect if it doesn't rely on sight, as with blindsight, or can see through illusions, as with truesight.

cards.title: Branding Smite
cards.description: Enchant Weapon: Next hit deals 2d6 radiant damage, revealing invisible targets and preventing invisibility. Target sheds dim light in 5-ft radius.

cards.title: Burning Hands
cards.description: Casting Burning Hands creates a 15-foot cone of flames. Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half on a success. Flammable objects ignite.

cards.title: Call Lightning
cards.description: Create a 10ft tall storm cloud with a 60ft radius above you. Lightning strikes a point you can see, dealing 3d10 lightning damage to creatures within 5ft on a failed save. Use your action to call lightning each turn. Outdoors in a storm increases damage by 1d10.

cards.title: Calm Emotions
cards.description: In a 20-foot radius, creatures make a charisma save or become indifferent to chosen foes. Suppress charmed or frightened effects; effects resume when spell ends. Indifference ends if attacked.

cards.title: Chain Lightning
cards.description: Create a lightning bolt that jumps to 3 other targets within 30 feet. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw; those who fail take 10d8 lightning damage, halved on a successful save.

cards.title: Charm Person
cards.description: Charm Person: Charm humanoid, Wisdom save. Fails = charmed until spell ends or harmed. Considers caster a friendly acquaintance. Target aware of charm ending.

cards.title: Chill Touch
cards.description: Create a skeletal hand attacking a creature within range. On a hit, target takes 1d8 necrotic damage and can't regain hit points until your next turn. Undead hit has disadvantage attacking you. Damage increases at 5th, 11th, and 17th levels.

cards.title: Circle Of Death
cards.description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out in a 60-foot radius sphere from a point within range. Each creature in that area must make a constitution saving throw. A target takes 8d6 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

cards.title: Clairvoyance
cards.description: Create an invisible sensor at a known or unknown location for seeing or hearing. Use chosen sense through sensor as if there. Switch between senses as an action. Visible as luminous orb to those with see invisibility or truesight.

cards.title: Clone
cards.description: Create an inert duplicate of a living creature that grows to maturity in 120 days inside a sealed vessel. If the original dies, its soul transfers to the clone if willing. The clone is identical but lacks equipment; the original remains inert.

cards.title: Cloudkill
cards.description: Create a 20-ft-radius sphere of yellow-green poisonous fog that heavily obscures area. Deals 5d8 poison damage on failed save (Con), half on success. Moves 10 ft away from caster each turn. Creatures must save when entering area or starting turn inside. Works even if creatures hold breath or don'...

cards.title: Color Spray
cards.description: Color Spray: Roll 6d10 to determine total hit points affected. Creatures in a 15-foot cone are blinded in order of ascending hit points, until total hit points are subtracted or all creatures affected.

cards.title: Command
cards.description: Command: A one-word command forces a creature to obey on its next turn, unless it's undead, doesn't understand you, or the command is harmful. Examples include making it approach, drop items, flee, grovel, or halt. Any other command is at the GM's discretion, ending if impossible to fulfill.

cards.title: Commune
cards.description: "Commune" spell allows you to ask up to three yes/no questions to your deity or divine proxy, receiving accurate answers. Be cautious of asking too frequently, as chances of receiving no answers increase with each casting until a long rest is taken.

cards.title: Commune With Nature
cards.description: Become one with nature, gaining knowledge of surrounding territory. Within 3 miles outdoors or 300 feet underground, learn 3 facts about terrain, creatures, celestials, buildings, or other planes. Not effective in constructed areas.

cards.title: Comprehend Languages
cards.description: Comprehend Languages: Understand spoken and written languages, needing touch to read. Can't decode secret messages or non-language glyphs.

cards.title: Compulsion
cards.description: Wisdom saving throw compels targets to move in designated direction each turn until they save, avoiding obvious hazards but risking opportunity attacks.

cards.title: Cone Of Cold
cards.description: A blast of cold air erupts from your hands. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a constitution saving throw. A creature takes 8d8 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

cards.title: Confusion
cards.description: Phantasmal Force causes delusions and erratic behavior. Targets in a 10-ft radius must make a Wisdom save or be affected. They can't react and roll a d10 each turn to determine their behavior, ending the effect with a successful save at the end of their turn.

cards.title: Conjure Animals
cards.description: Summon fey spirits in beast form to unoccupied spaces within range: 1 CR 2 beast, 2 CR 1 beasts, 4 CR 1/2 beasts, or 8 CR 1/4 beasts. They're friendly, obey commands, and vanish at 0 HP or spell end. Roll initiative for group turns.

cards.title: Conjure Celestial
cards.description: Summon a CR 4 or lower celestial to fight for you. It acts on its own initiative, obeys verbal commands, defends allies, and disappears when it dies or spell ends.

cards.title: Conjure Elemental
cards.description: Summon an elemental servant based on your choice of air, earth, fire, or water, within a 10-foot cube. It has a challenge rating of 5 or lower, is friendly to you and your allies, acts on its own initiative, follows verbal commands, and defends against threats. If concentration is broken, it may...

cards.title: Conjure Fey
cards.description: Summon a fey creature or fey beast (CR 6 or lower) to fight alongside you and your party. It obeys your commands, rolls its own initiative, and stays for 1 hour or until dismissed. If concentration is lost, it may become hostile.

cards.title: Conjure Minor Elementals
cards.description: Summon Elementals: Summons friendly elementals based on CR choice: 1 CR 2 or lower, 2 CR 1 or lower, 4 CR 1/2 or lower, or 8 CR 1/4 or lower. Creatures vanish at 0 HP or spell end. Roll initiative for them as a group, obey verbal commands, and defend

cards.title: Conjure Woodland Beings
cards.description: Summon fey creatures of various challenge ratings to fight for you. They act on their own turns, following verbal commands or defending themselves if none are given. Creatures disappear at 0 HP or when the spell ends.

cards.title: Contact Other Plane
cards.description: Contact an extraplanar intelligence by making an Intelligence saving throw (DC 15). Failure results in 6d6 psychic damage, insanity until a long rest, and inability to act or understand. Success allows asking five yes/no questions answered with one word or short phrase.

cards.title: Contagion
cards.description: Melee spell attack inflicts chosen disease. Target makes constitution saves, failing 3 times causes disease to persist, succeeding 3 times cures it. Diseases include Blinding Sickness, Filth Fever, Flesh Rot, Mindfire, Seizure, and Slimy Doom.

cards.title: Contingency
cards.description: With the contingency spell, cast a chosen spell of 5th level or lower that targets you to trigger under specific conditions set during casting. Once met, the contingent spell activates immediately, ending the contingency. Only one contingency spell can be active at a time and ends if its material...

cards.title: Continual Flame
cards.description: A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch, springs forth from an object that you touch. The effect looks like a regular flame, but it creates no heat and doesn't use oxygen. A continual flame can be covered or hidden but not smothered or quenched.

cards.title: Control Water
cards.description: Control water: Choose Flood (rise water 20ft), Part Water (create trench), Redirect Flow (control water direction), or Whirlpool (pull creatures towards vortex, deal damage). Maintain effect until spell ends or choose new one each turn.

cards.title: Control Weather
cards.description: Control Weather: Alter weather conditions within 5 miles outdoors. Change precipitation, temperature, and wind. Effects take 1d4 x 10 minutes to manifest. Can change conditions multiple times. Ends gradually.

cards.title: Counterspell
cards.description: Counteract spells of 3rd level or lower automatically; for 4th level or higher, make an ability check (DC= 10 + spell level) using your spellcasting ability to nullify the spell.

cards.title: Create Food And Water
cards.description: You create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water on the ground or in containers within range, enough to sustain up to fifteen humanoids or five steeds for 24 hours. The food is bland but nourishing, and spoils if uneaten after 24 hours. The water is clean and doesn't go bad.

cards.title: Create Or Destroy Water
cards.description: Create or destroy up to 10 gallons of water in an open container or create rain/fog in a 30ft cube within range.

cards.title: Create Undead
cards.description: Animate Dead Night: Cast at night, control up to three Medium or Small humanoid corpses as ghouls for 24 hours. Command them mentally within 120 feet, issuing actions or guarding. Reassert control by recasting before 24 hours expire.

cards.title: Creation
cards.description: Create object up to 5ft cube from shadowfell material: veg matter lasts 1 day, stone/crystal 12 hrs, metals 1 hr, gems 10 mins, adamantine/mithral 1 min. Can't be used as spell component or spell fails.

cards.title: Cure Wounds
cards.description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

cards.title: Dancing Lights
cards.description: Create up to four torch-sized lights that shed dim light in 10-ft radius. They can appear as torches, lanterns, orbs, or combine into a humanoid form. Move lights up to 60 ft as a bonus action. Lights must stay within 20 ft of each other or wink out if beyond spell range.

cards.title: Darkness
cards.description: Create a 15-ft radius sphere of magical darkness that moves with its source, blocking darkvision and nonmagical light. Overlapping light spells of 2nd level or lower are dispelled.

cards.title: Darkvision
cards.description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark. For the duration, that creature has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

cards.title: Daylight
cards.description: Create a 60-foot radius sphere of bright light spreading from a chosen point, shedding dim light further. Light moves with object if chosen. Opaque cover blocks light. Dispel darkness of 3rd level or lower if overlapped.

cards.title: Death Ward
cards.description: Death Ward: Touch a creature to prevent it from dropping to 0 hit points from damage once, leaving it at 1 HP. Also protects from instant death effects until the spell ends.

cards.title: Delayed Blast Fireball
cards.description: Create a glowing bead that explodes into a 20-foot-radius fireball. Damage starts at 12d6 and increases by 1d6 each turn. Creatures hit make Dex saves or take damage. Bead can be thrown or touched to detonate early. Objects in the area are also damaged.

cards.title: Demiplane
cards.description: Shadowy door on a surface leads to a demiplane room. Creatures entering can be trapped when the spell ends. Create new demiplanes or connect to existing ones. Can link to demiplanes from other castings if known.

cards.title: Detect Evil And Good
cards.description: For the duration, sense aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, undead, and consecrated or desecrated areas within 30 feet, knowing their location. Can penetrate barriers except for specific materials like stone, metal, lead, wood, or dirt.

cards.title: Detect Magic
cards.description: For the duration, sense magic within 30 feet, use action to see aura on magic-bearing creatures or objects, learn school of magic. Penetrates most barriers but blocked by 1ft stone, 1in metal, thin lead sheet, or 3ft wood/dirt.

cards.title: Detect Poison And Disease
cards.description: For the spell's duration, sense poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet, identifying each. Can penetrate most barriers but blocked by 1ft stone, 1in metal, thin lead sheet, or 3ft wood/dirt.

cards.title: Detect Thoughts
cards.description: During this spell's duration, you can read the surface thoughts of creatures within 30 feet, except those with an Intelligence of 3 or lower. You can probe deeper into one creature's mind by making it do a Wisdom save; success ends the spell. Interrogative questioning influences the creature's th...

cards.title: Dimension Door
cards.description: Teleport spell: Instantly move to any visible or described location within range, bringing objects and one willing creature. Risk force damage if destination is occupied.

cards.title: Disguise Self
cards.description: Disguise Self: Alter your appearance, clothing, and gear, appearing up to 1 foot shorter or taller and changing weight. Illusion doesn't withstand physical inspection, objects pass through. Creature can use action to inspect and make a check against your spell save DC to see through the disguise.

cards.title: Disintegrate
cards.description: Finger of Death spell: Green ray targets creature or object, forcing Dex save. Failed save deals 10d6 + 40 force damage; target disintegrates at 0 HP. Nonmagical objects are automatically disintegrated; magic items are unaffected.

cards.title: Dispel Evil And Good
cards.description: "Protection from Evil and Good": Grants protection against fey, undead, and extraplanar creatures. Disadvantage on attacks from celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead. Can end early to break enchantments or dismiss creatures back to their home planes with a melee spell attack.

cards.title: Dispel Magic
cards.description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends. For each spell of 4th level or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a successful check, the spell ends.

cards.title: Divination
cards.description: Contact a god or servants with a single question about a specific event within 7 days. Receive a truthful reply in form of a phrase, rhyme, or omen. Casting multiple times increases chance of random reading.

cards.title: Divine Favor
cards.description: Your prayer empowers you with divine radiance. Until the spell ends, your weapon attacks deal an extra 1d4 radiant damage on a hit.

cards.title: Divine Word
cards.description: Divine Word: Utter a word of creation, forcing Charisma saving throws on chosen creatures. Effects vary based on hit points, from deafening to instant death. Celestials, elementals, fey, or fiends may be banished back to their plane.

cards.title: Dominate Beast
cards.description: Charm Person: Charms a visible creature within range on a failed Wisdom save. Establishes telepathic link and can issue simple commands. Advantage on save if fighting with allies. Can take total control for one turn by using an action. Target can save again when taking damage.

cards.title: Dominate Monster
cards.description: Charm creature to obey your commands with telepathic link. Advantage on save if fighting it. Can take total control for one turn. Save ends charm on damage.

cards.title: Dominate Person
cards.description: Charm Person: Charms humanoid on failed save, grants telepathic link, and allows issuing simple commands. Can take total control for 1 turn with action. Target makes new save when damaged.

cards.title: Dream
cards.description: Dream shapes a creature's dreams on the same plane. Messenger appears in target's dream if asleep, creating environments and images. Messenger can end trance early. Can be monstrous and terrifying, causing nightmares on fail, dealing 3d6 psychic damage upon waking. Target makes save with disadvan...

cards.title: Druidcraft
cards.description: Nature's Whispers: Choose from various sensory effects within range - predict weather, bloom a flower, create sounds or scents, or light/snuff small fires. Lasts 1 round.

cards.title: Earthquake
cards.description: "**Earthquake**: Creates tremors in a 100-ft radius, making ground difficult terrain. Creatures concentrating must save. Concentrating creatures and structures must save each turn or be knocked prone. Can cause fissures and structures to collapse, dealing damage and potentially burying creatures."

cards.title: Eldritch Blast
cards.description: Eldritch Blast: Ranged spell attack deals 1d10 force damage. Creates 2 beams at 5th level, 3 at 11th, and 4 at 17th level. Can target one or multiple creatures. Roll attack separately for each beam.

cards.title: Enhance Ability
cards.description: Enhance Ability: Choose Bear's Endurance, Bull's Strength, Cat's Grace, Eagle's Splendor, Fox's Cunning, or Owl's Wisdom. Grants advantage on related ability checks and additional effects until spell ends.

cards.title: Enlarge/Reduce
cards.description: Change a creature or object's size. Enlarge it to double dimensions, gain weight, and deal extra damage; advantage on Strength. Reduce to half size, lose weight, deal less damage; disadvantage on Strength. Unwilling target can save.

cards.title: Entangle
cards.description: Entangling plants grow in a 20ft square, creating difficult terrain. Creatures in the area must save or be restrained. They can use an action to break free with a Strength check.

cards.title: Enthrall
cards.description: Cast a spell to distract creatures with your words. Targets make a Wisdom saving throw; if failed, they get disadvantage on Perception checks to notice others. The spell ends if you're incapacitated or silent.

cards.title: Etherealness
cards.description: Etherealness: Step into the Border Ethereal, able to move in any direction with extra cost for vertical movement. Can affect/be affected by creatures on Ethereal Plane only. Invisible and can move through objects on original plane. Returns to original plane when spell ends, risking force damage i...

cards.title: Expeditious Retreat
cards.description: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace. When you cast this spell, and then as a bonus action on each of your turns until the spell ends, you can take the Dash action.

cards.title: Eyebite
cards.description: Eyes become void, dread power emanates. Target makes Wis save or becomes asleep, panicked, or sickened. Can switch targets each turn.

cards.title: Fabricate
cards.description: Fabricate lets you transform visible raw materials into objects of the same material. Objects can be Large or smaller if organic, or up to Medium if metal or stone. Quality depends on raw materials. Can't create creatures, magic items, or complex items without proficiency.

cards.title: Faerie Fire
cards.description: Creates a 20ft cube of light, outlining objects & creatures. Failing a Dex save outlines creatures. Shedding dim light for 10ft, affected targets can't benefit from invisibility & attackers have advantage if they can see them.

cards.title: Faithful Hound
cards.description: Conjure an invisible watchdog that barks at intruders within 30 feet, ignores illusions, and attacks enemies within 5 feet dealing 4d8 piercing damage.

cards.title: False Life
cards.description: Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, you gain 1d4 + 4 temporary hit points for the duration.

cards.title: Fear
cards.description: Phantasmal Fright projects a fear-inducing image in a 30-ft cone. Failing a Wis save causes fear, dropping held items and movement away from you. Creatures can re-save if out of sight, ending the spell on success.

cards.title: Feather Fall
cards.description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.

cards.title: Feeblemind
cards.description: Psychic Scream: Deal 4d6 psychic damage to a target and reduce its Intelligence and Charisma to 1 on a failed save. The creature is incapacitated but can identify and protect allies. Save every 30 days, end with restoration spells or wish.

cards.title: Find Familiar
cards.description: Summon a familiar in animal form of your choice: bat, cat, crab, etc. It obeys commands, acts in combat, and vanishes at 0 hit points. Communicate telepathically within 100 feet, see/hear through its senses, and deliver touch spells up to 100 feet away using your spell attack modifier.

cards.title: Find Steed
cards.description: Summon a celestial, fey, or fiend steed with chosen stats and form. Bond allows telepathic communication, shared spells, and instinctive unity in combat. Dismiss or resummon at will. Only one steed at a time.

cards.title: Find The Path
cards.description: Find the Path spell guides you to a familiar fixed location on the same plane, showing distance and direction. It aids in choosing the shortest path, but won't work for moving or vague destinations.

cards.title: Find Traps
cards.description: Detect Traps: Sense harmful traps within range and line of sight. Reveals presence and general danger of intentional, harmful traps like alarm spells, glyph of warding, or mechanical traps, not natural hazards. Location not revealed.

cards.title: Finger Of Death
cards.description: Inflict Wounds: Target takes 7d8 + 30 necrotic damage on a failed Con save. Humanoid killed rises as zombie under your command.

cards.title: Fire Bolt
cards.description: Hurl a fire mote at a target within range, making a ranged spell attack. On hit, target takes 1d10 fire damage. Flammable objects ignite. Damage increases at higher levels: 5th (2d10), 11th (3d10), 17th (4d10).

cards.title: Fire Shield
cards.description: "Fiery Shield: Surrounds you with light in 10-ft radius, can be heat or cold shield. Grants cold resistance and fire damage resistance. Flames deal 2d8 fire or cold damage to attackers within 5 feet on hit. Can dismiss with action."

cards.title: Fire Storm
cards.description: Create a roaring flame storm in a chosen location, up to ten 10-foot cubes. Creatures in the area make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 7d10 fire damage on a failed save or half on a success. Damages objects, ignites flammable ones not worn, and can exclude plant life.

cards.title: Fireball
cards.description: Fireball: A 20-ft radius explosion occurs at a point within range, dealing 8d6 fire damage to creatures in the area. Dexterity save for half damage. Fire spreads, igniting flammable objects.

cards.title: Flame Blade
cards.description: Summon a fiery scimitar as a bonus action, making a melee spell attack dealing 3d6 fire damage on hit. Blade sheds light in 10ft radius. Disappears if dropped, but can be summoned again.

cards.title: Flame Strike
cards.description: "Call down a column of divine fire, dealing 4d6 fire and 4d6 radiant damage in a 10-ft radius, 40-ft high cylinder. Targets make a Dexterity saving throw for half damage."

cards.title: Flaming Sphere
cards.description: Create a 5-ft sphere of fire dealing 2d6 damage to nearby creatures on a failed save. Move it up to 30 ft as a bonus action, causing damage if it hits a creature. Can pass over obstacles and ignite flammable objects.

cards.title: Flesh To Stone
cards.description: You attempt to turn a creature into stone. It must make a Constitution saving throw or be restrained. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each turn. After 3 successful saves, the spell ends; after 3 fails, it turns to stone.

cards.title: Floating Disk
cards.description: Create a 3ft diameter force disk that holds up to 500 pounds, floating up to 3ft above ground. It can't move if you're within 20ft, follows you at that range, and can navigate terrain but not elevation changes over 10ft. Ends if overloaded or if you move over 100ft away.

cards.title: Fly
cards.description: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft, unless it can stop the fall.

cards.title: Fog Cloud
cards.description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.

cards.title: Forbiddance
cards.description: Forbiddance spell creates a protective ward in a 40,000 sq. ft area, blocking teleportation and planar travel. Choose creature types to take 5d10 radiant/necrotic damage entering. Password allows entry without harm. Lasts indefinitely after 30 daily castings.

cards.title: Forcecage
cards.description: Create an invisible cube-shaped prison made of magical force, either a cage or a solid box, around a chosen area. Cage can be 20 ft, box 10 ft. Creatures fully inside are trapped, others pushed out. Prevents teleportation, interplanar travel, and blocks ethereal travel. Can't be dispelled.

cards.title: Foresight
cards.description: Grant a willing creature prescience: immune to surprise, advantage on attacks, checks, saves, and enemies have disadvantage when attacking. Expires when recast or after duration.

cards.title: Freedom Of Movement
cards.description: Grant a willing creature immunity to difficult terrain, speed reduction, paralysis, and restraint from spells and effects. It can escape nonmagical restraints with 5ft movement and has no movement penalties underwater.

cards.title: Freezing Sphere
cards.description: Hurl a frigid globe that explodes in a 60-ft radius, dealing 10d6 cold damage on a failed Con save. Freezes water, trapping creatures, which can break free with a Str check. Can be thrown or set down to explode after 1 minute.

cards.title: Gaseous Form
cards.description: Transform a willing creature into misty cloud form, granting flying speed of 10ft, resistance to nonmagical damage, advantage on STR/DEX/CON saves, ability to pass through small openings, and hover in the air. Cannot attack, talk, or manipulate objects.

cards.title: Gate
cards.description: Conjure a portal to link two planes, 5-20 feet in diameter. Can specify a target creature’s name to draw it through. Deities can block portals. Creatures are free upon arrival.

cards.title: Geas
cards.description: Command a creature to obey or abstain from an action. On failed save, it's charmed, taking psychic damage for disobedience. Can't command suicide. Ends with your action, remove curse, greater restoration, or wish spell.

cards.title: Gentle Repose
cards.description: "Gentle Repose" preserves a corpse, preventing decay and undead transformation. It extends the time limit for resurrection spells by pausing decay's progression.

cards.title: Giant Insect
cards.description: Transform small insects into giant versions of themselves, up to 10 centipedes, 3 spiders, 5 wasps, or 1 scorpion. Creatures follow verbal commands, act on your turn in combat, and remain giant until dismissed, reaching 0 HP, or spell ends. GM controls their stats and actions.

cards.title: Glibness
cards.description: Until the spell ends, when you make a Charisma check, you can replace the number you roll with a 15. Additionally, no matter what you say, magic that would determine if you are telling the truth indicates that you are being truthful.

cards.title: Globe Of Invulnerability
cards.description: Creates a 10ft radius barrier blocking spells of 5th level or lower cast from outside. Spells can't affect inside creatures/objects, even if cast at higher levels. Inside area is protected from spells cast outside.

cards.title: Glyph Of Warding
cards.description: Inscribe a nearly invisible glyph on a surface or object with triggers like touching or opening. Choose *explosive runes* or *spell glyph*. *Explosive Runes* detonates in a 20-ft radius, dealing 5d8 damage. *Spell Glyph* stores a spell (3rd level or lower) to cast when triggered.

cards.title: Goodberry
cards.description: Create 10 magical berries that restore 1 HP when eaten as an action, providing sustenance for a day. Berries expire after 24 hours.

cards.title: Grease
cards.description: Create a 10-ft greased square, difficult terrain. Creatures must save or fall prone when entering or ending turn in area.

cards.title: Greater Invisibility
cards.description: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person.

cards.title: Greater Restoration
cards.description: Touch a creature to remove exhaustion level, charm/petrification, curse/attunement to cursed item, ability score reduction, or hit point maximum reduction.

cards.title: Guardian Of Faith
cards.description: Summon a Large spectral guardian with a gleaming sword and shield bearing your deity's symbol. Enemies within 10 feet risk 20 radiant damage on a failed Dex save or half on a success. Vanishes after dealing 60 damage.

cards.title: Guards And Wards
cards.description: Guards and Wards creates a protective ward over 2,500 sq. ft. area, with fog, illusions, locked doors, webs on stairs, and optional magical effects. You can specify immunity for individuals and a password. The spell's effects can be dispelled individually.

cards.title: Guidance
cards.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check. The spell then ends.

cards.title: Guiding Bolt
cards.description: Hurl a light beam at a target, dealing 4d6 radiant damage on hit. Target is illuminated, granting advantage on the next attack against it before the end of your next turn.

cards.title: Gust Of Wind
cards.description: "Wind Wall" creates a 60ft long, 10ft wide line of wind from you. Creatures in the line are pushed 15ft on a failed Strength save, and movement towards you is difficult. The wind disperses gas, extinguishes unprotected flames, and has a chance to affect protected flames. You can change the direct...

cards.title: Hallow
cards.description: Hallow spell creates a sacred or unholy area up to 60ft radius. Limits entry to celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead while excluding chosen types. Grants an extra effect like Courage, Darkness, Daylight, Energy Protection, Energy Vulnerability, Everlasting Rest, Extradimensional Interf...

cards.title: Hallucinatory Terrain
cards.description: Alter the appearance of natural terrain in a 150-foot cube to mimic a different type of terrain. Tactile characteristics remain the same, requiring a successful check to see through the illusion. Structures, creatures, and equipment are unaffected.

cards.title: Harm
cards.description: Inflict Wounds: Target makes a Con save. On fail: takes 14d6 necrotic dmg (hp not below 1). Success: half dmg. Failed save reduces target's hp max for 1hr by the dmg taken. Disease removal reverts hp max.

cards.title: Haste
cards.description: Haste: Target gains doubled speed, +2 AC, advantage on Dexterity saves, and extra action for Attack, Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use Object. After spell ends, target is incapacitated.

cards.title: Heal
cards.description: Choose a creature that you can see within range. A surge of positive energy washes through the creature, causing it to regain 70 hit points. This spell also ends blindness, deafness, and any diseases affecting the target. This spell has no effect on constructs or undead.

cards.title: Healing Word
cards.description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

cards.title: Heat Metal
cards.description: Heat Metal: Choose a metal object within range to glow red-hot, dealing 2d8 fire damage to creatures touching it. As a bonus action, deal damage again. If a creature holding/wearing it takes damage, must pass a Con save or drop it, suffering disadvantage if they keep it.

cards.title: Hellish Rebuke
cards.description: You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by hellish flames. The creature must make a dexterity saving throw. It takes 2d10 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

cards.title: Heroes' Feast
cards.description: "Create a feast for up to twelve creatures with curative effects. After 1 hour, creatures gain immunity to poison/frightened, advantage on wisdom saves, healed of diseases/poison, +2d10 max HP, and HP increase for 24 hours."

cards.title: Heroism
cards.description: Touch a willing creature to grant immunity to fear and temporary hit points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier each turn. Temporary hit points end when the spell does.

cards.title: Hideous Laughter
cards.description: Tasha's Hideous Laughter causes a targeted creature to perceive everything as funny, potentially falling prone and becoming incapacitated. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns and when it takes damage, with advantage on the latter.

cards.title: Hold Monster
cards.description: Paralyze a visible creature with Wisdom save. Targets can retry save each round to end the spell. No effect on undead.

cards.title: Hold Person
cards.description: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

cards.title: Holy Aura
cards.description: Radiant aura creates a 30ft radius of dim light. Chosen creatures gain advantage on saves, enemies have disadvantage on attacks against them. Fiends/undead attacking them risk being blinded.

cards.title: Hunter'S Mark
cards.description: Mark a creature as your quarry, dealing 1d6 extra damage on hits and gaining advantage on Perception/Survival checks to find it. On target's defeat, mark a new creature with a bonus action.

cards.title: Hypnotic Pattern
cards.description: Color Spray creates a dazzling pattern in a 30-foot cube, charming creatures who fail a wisdom saving throw. Charmed creatures are incapacitated with 0 speed until they take damage or are shaken out of it with an action.

cards.title: Ice Storm
cards.description: Call forth a hailstorm in a 20-ft radius, 40-ft high cylinder. Creatures in it make Dex saves, taking 2d8 bludgeoning and 4d6 cold damage on a fail, half on a success. Area becomes difficult terrain until your next turn.

cards.title: Identify
cards.description: Identify allows you to learn properties of a touched magic item, including if it requires attunement, charges, and current spells affecting it. If cast on a creature, you learn what spells are affecting it.

cards.title: Illusory Script
cards.description: Illusory Script: Write and enchant a message that appears normal to designated creatures. Others see it as unintelligible or a different message. Dispel erases original & illusion. Truesight reveals hidden content.

cards.title: Imprisonment
cards.description: Create a magical prison binding a creature on a failed Wisdom save. Choose imprisonment form: Burial (mithral orb), Chaining (precious metal chain), Hedged Prison (jade miniature), Minimus Containment (gemstone), or Slumber (soporific herbs). Specify a condition for release. Dispel at 9th level e...

cards.title: Incendiary Cloud
cards.description: Create a 20-foot-radius cloud of smoke and embers at a point within range. Heavily obscures and deals 10d8 fire damage to creatures inside when cast and when they enter it. Moves 10 feet away from caster each turn. Lasts until dispersed by wind.

cards.title: Inflict Wounds
cards.description: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

cards.title: Insect Plague
cards.description: Summon a 20ft radius swarm of locusts that lasts, creating lightly obscured, difficult terrain. Creatures in it make a Con save or take 4d10 piercing damage, repeated on entry or end turn.

cards.title: Instant Summons
cards.description: "Brand's Instant Summons" marks an object, inscribing its name on a sapphire. By crushing the gem later, the item teleports to your hand, unless held by another. In that case, you learn the possessor's identity and location. Dispelling the sapphire cancels the spell.

cards.title: Invisibility
cards.description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

cards.title: Irresistible Dance
cards.description: Target creature within range dances in place, unable to move, with disadvantage on dex saves and attacks. Others have advantage on attacks against it. Can retry saving throw to end the spell.

cards.title: Jump
cards.description: You touch a creature. The creature's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

cards.title: Knock
cards.description: Unlock an object within range, like a door or chest. Opens mundane locks or suppresses arcane lock spell for 10 minutes, allowing normal use. Emits a loud knock audible up to 300 feet away.

cards.title: Legend Lore
cards.description: The spell "Legend Lore" reveals significant lore about a named person, place, or object, ranging from current tales to forgotten stories or secret knowledge. The more you know, the more precise the information, though it may be veiled in figurative language.

cards.title: Lesser Restoration
cards.description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it. The condition can be blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

cards.title: Levitate
cards.description: Levitate: Target rises 20 ft up, can move by pushing against objects, save negates, 500 lb max weight. You can move target 20 ft each turn. Ends with target gently floating to the ground.

cards.title: Light
cards.description: "Enlighten an object with 20ft bright light, 20ft dim light; color customizable. Opaque cover blocks light. Ends if recast or dismissed. Hostile creature must save to avoid light if object worn."

cards.title: Lightning Bolt
cards.description: 5th-level spell Lightning Bolt: 100ft line of lightning, Dex save for 8d6 damage. Half damage on save. Ignites flammable objects.

cards.title: Locate Animals Or Plants
cards.description: Describe or name a specific kind of beast or plant. Concentrating on the voice of nature in your surroundings, you learn the direction and distance to the closest creature or plant of that kind within 5 miles, if any are present.

cards.title: Locate Creature
cards.description: Familiar creature's direction sensed within 1,000 feet, knowing if moving. Can locate specific known creature or nearest of a kind seen up close. Won't work if polymorphed or blocked by running water.

cards.title: Locate Object
cards.description: Locate Object: Sense direction of known object within 1,000 ft. or nearest object of a specific kind. Must have seen target within 30 ft. once. Blocked by lead.

cards.title: Longstrider
cards.description: You touch a creature. The target's speed increases by 10 feet until the spell ends.

cards.title: Mage Armor
cards.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

cards.title: Mage Hand
cards.description: "Spectral hand appears, controlled by you within 30ft. Can manipulate objects, open doors, retrieve items, or pour liquids. Can't attack, carry over 10lbs, or activate magic items. Lasts until dismissed or beyond 30ft."

cards.title: Magic Circle
cards.description: Create a magical cylinder affecting celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead. They can't willingly enter or affect targets inside it. Can be reversed to trap creatures inside.

cards.title: Magic Jar
cards.description: Project your soul from your body into a container, gaining awareness of surroundings. Possess a humanoid by projecting soul up to 100 feet, attempting to take control. Your stats are replaced by the host's, except alignment and mental scores. Can return to container or die if host body perishes....

cards.title: Magic Missile
cards.description: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

cards.title: Magic Mouth
cards.description: "Cast Magic Mouth to implant a message in an object. Triggered by specific visual or audible conditions within 30 feet, the object speaks the message in your voice."

cards.title: Magic Weapon
cards.description: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

cards.title: Magnificent Mansion
cards.description: Create a magnificent mansion with a foyer and chambers, up to 50 cubes in size. Portal is invisible when closed. Servants can perform various tasks but not harm others. Disappears when spell ends.

cards.title: Major Image
cards.description: Create a realistic image within a 20-foot cube, including sounds and smells, that lasts until dispelled. Can't cause damage or sicken. Can move image within range and change its appearance. Interacting reveals it as an illusion; creature can see through with successful check.

cards.title: Mass Cure Wounds
cards.description: A wave of healing energy washes out from a point of your choice within range. Choose up to six creatures in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each target regains hit points equal to 3d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

cards.title: Mass Heal
cards.description: Healing Flood: Restore up to 700 hit points to visible creatures within range. Cures diseases, blindness, and deafness. Doesn't affect undead or constructs.

cards.title: Mass Healing Word
cards.description: As you call out words of restoration, up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

cards.title: Mass Suggestion
cards.description: Influence up to twelve creatures to follow a reasonable suggestion for the spell's duration, with a failed save resulting in the target carrying out the action. Harmful suggestions negate the spell, and a trigger condition can be set. Damage from you or allies ends the effect.

cards.title: Maze
cards.description: Banish a creature to a demiplane maze. It tries to escape with a DC 20 Intelligence check, auto-success for minotaurs or goristros. On escape, it reappears in its original space or nearest unoccupied.

cards.title: Meld Into Stone
cards.description: Step into a stone object, becoming undetectable but blind and immobile. Can cast spells on self. Exiting expels you, causing damage based on stone's condition.

cards.title: Mending
cards.description: Mending repairs breaks or tears up to 1 foot in any dimension on objects you touch, including magic items or constructs, but cannot restore magic to them.

cards.title: Message
cards.description: Message: Send a whispered message to a target within range, enabling them to reply only to you. You can cast it through barriers if familiar with the target. Soundproof obstacles impede the spell, but it can navigate corners and openings.

cards.title: Meteor Swarm
cards.description: "Call Lightning Storm" creates fiery orbs at 4 points within range, each causing 20d6 fire & bludgeoning damage in a 40ft radius. Targets make DEX saves for half. Damage doesn't stack for targets hit by multiple orbs. It damages objects and ignites unattended flammable objects.

cards.title: Mind Blank
cards.description: Grant a willing creature immunity to psychic damage, emotion sensing, mind reading, divination, charm, and effects targeting their mind or information. Foils wish spells and similar powers.

cards.title: Minor Illusion
cards.description: Create an illusion of sound or object within range lasting until dismissed. Sound can be whisper to scream, objects up to 5-foot cube. Illusion lacks sensory effects, can be discerned with successful check against spell save DC.

cards.title: Mirage Arcane
cards.description: Create an illusory terrain up to 1 mile square, altering its appearance and tactile elements but not its shape. It can mimic difficult terrain or structures, impede movement, and includes auditory, visual, tactile, and olfactory components. Truesight reveals the illusion's true form but doesn't d...

cards.title: Mirror Image
cards.description: Create illusory duplicates of yourself that mimic your actions, making it hard for enemies to target you accurately. Roll a d20 when attacked to see if the duplicate is targeted instead. Duplicates have AC 10 + your Dexterity. Spell ends when all duplicates are destroyed. Unaffected by truesight...

cards.title: Mislead
cards.description: Become invisible with illusory double. Double can move, gesture, speak. You can see/hear through it. Switch between senses as bonus action. Blinded/deafened while using double's senses. End invisibility if attacking or casting spell.

cards.title: Misty Step
cards.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

cards.title: Modify Memory
cards.description: Modify Memory: Target makes a Wis save. On fail, charmed & incapacitated, unaware of surroundings. You can alter a recent 10-min event in last 24 hrs. Spell ends if damaged or targeted. Must describe changes to target for altered memories to stick. Remove Curse or Greater Restoration restores tru...

cards.title: Moonbeam
cards.description: Create a 40ft-high cylinder of dim light. Creatures take 2d10 radiant damage and must save or revert to original form when entering or starting turn in its area. Move the beam 60ft each turn. Shapechangers have disadvantage on the saving throw.

cards.title: Move Earth
cards.description: Mold Earth: Reshape 40x40 ft. of dirt, sand, or clay within 30 ft. Raise/lower elevation, create/fill trench, erect/flatten wall, or form pillar up to half area's largest dimension. Changes complete in 10 mins. Can't manipulate stone or directly affect plants. Structures shift and might collapse...

cards.title: Nondetection
cards.description: For the duration, you hide a target that you touch from divination magic. The target can be a willing creature or a place or an object no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. The target can't be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

cards.title: Pass Without Trace
cards.description: Cloak of Shadows: Creates a 30 ft radius of concealment. Grants +10 to Stealth and prevents tracking by non-magical means for chosen creatures. No traces left behind.

cards.title: Passwall
cards.description: Create a passage up to 5ft wide, 8ft tall, and 20ft deep on wood, plaster, or stone surface. No structural damage. When the spell ends, creatures and objects inside are safely ejected to the nearest unoccupied space.

cards.title: Phantasmal Killer
cards.description: Manifest a creature's fears as illusions, causing it to be frightened on a failed save. It takes 4d10 psychic damage if it fails another save each turn.

cards.title: Phantom Steed
cards.description: Create a Large, customizable horselike creature with saddle and gear that can be ridden for an hour at 100 ft speed, traveling 10 miles normally or 13 miles fast. Steed disappears in 1 min when spell ends or if it takes damage; dismissible with an action.

cards.title: Planar Ally
cards.description: Summon Otherworldly Being: Call a celestial, elemental, or fiend to aid you for a service, but it is not compelled to obey. Negotiate with it for tasks from simple to complex, offering payment in gold, items, sacrifices, or quests. Payments range from 100 gp per minute to 10,000 gp per day based...

cards.title: Planar Binding
cards.description: "Binding spell forces celestials, elementals, fey, or fiends to serve you. Target must save vs. charisma. Bound entity follows commands, extends duration of summoning spells, and reports back if task is completed."

cards.title: Plane Shift
cards.description: Teleport up to 8 creatures to a chosen plane or location, or banish a creature with a melee spell attack; on hit, they make a Charisma save or are sent to a random location on a specific plane.

cards.title: Plant Growth
cards.description: "Plant Growth" spell: instant cast thickens plants in 100-ft radius for difficult terrain. 8-hour ritual enriches plants in half-mile radius for a year, doubling food yield.

cards.title: Poison Spray
cards.description: Vile poison spray spell emits noxious gas from your hand at a creature in range. Target makes a constitution saving throw, taking 1d12 poison damage on a fail. Damage increases at 5th (2d12), 11th (3d12), and 17th level (4d12).

cards.title: Polymorph
cards.description: Polymorph spell changes a creature into a beast, based on CR or level. Saves apply. Retains alignment, personality, and HP of new form. Stats change. Equipment melds but can't be used. Damage carries over if reverted due to 0 HP. Limited actions.

cards.title: Power Word Kill
cards.description: You utter a word of power that can compel one creature you can see within range to die instantly. If the creature you choose has 100 hit points or fewer, it dies. Otherwise, the spell has no effect.

cards.title: Power Word Stun
cards.description: Word of Power stuns a creature with 150 HP or less, causing it to make a Con save each turn to end the effect. No effect on creatures with more than 150 HP.

cards.title: Prayer Of Healing
cards.description: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range each regain hit points equal to 2d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

cards.title: Prestidigitation
cards.description: Prestidigitation creates various minor magical effects within range: sensory effects, lighting or extinguishing flames, cleaning or soiling objects, altering materials, creating marks, and producing trinkets or illusions lasting until your next turn. You can have up to three ongoing effects and d...

cards.title: Prismatic Spray
cards.description: Prismatic Spray: 8 rays of light in a cone; targets make dex save. Each ray has a different effect: fire, acid, lightning, poison, cold, restrain with petrification chance, blind with plane shift, or 2 random rays.

cards.title: Prismatic Wall
cards.description: Prismatic Wall creates a colorful barrier up to 90ft long or a 30ft diameter sphere. It emits bright light and affects creatures near it, potentially blinding them. The wall has 7 layers, each with a different color and effect, requiring different types of damage to destroy them. Creatures attemp...

cards.title: Private Sanctum
cards.description: Secure an area with a magical barrier, ranging from 5 to 100 feet. Choose properties like sound blockage, visual obscurity, divination sensor prevention, anti-teleportation, and planar travel block. Lasts until dismissed or made permanent after daily casting for a year.

cards.title: Produce Flame
cards.description: Create a 10ft bright light source. Can hurl as ranged attack for 1d8 fire damage, increasing with levels. Ends if dismissed, casting again, or attacking with it.

cards.title: Programmed Illusion
cards.description: Create scripted illusion within 30ft cube. Activates on specific trigger, lasting 5 mins. Inactive for 10 mins after. Trigger based on visual or audible conditions. Can be detected by investigation. Illusion disappears after performance.

cards.title: Project Image
cards.description: Create an intangible illusory copy of yourself that you can control, see, and hear through. It can move, gesture, and mimic you perfectly, but disappears if damaged. Others can see through it with a successful check.

cards.title: Protection From Energy
cards.description: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

cards.title: Protection From Evil And Good
cards.description: Shield a creature from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead. They have disadvantage on attacks, can't charm, frighten, or possess target, and target gains advantage on saving throws against those effects if already affected.

cards.title: Protection From Poison
cards.description: "Neutralize poison on a creature, granting advantage on poison saving throws and resistance to poison damage for the duration."

cards.title: Purify Food And Drink
cards.description: All nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

cards.title: Raise Dead
cards.description: Revivify brings back a willing soul to a dead creature within 10 days, healing it with 1 HP, removing poisons/diseases. It can't revive undead or restore missing body parts. The revived suffers -4 penalty that decreases after each rest.

cards.title: Ray Of Enfeeblement
cards.description: Finger of Enervation: Ranged spell attack weakens target, reducing weapon damage by half using Strength. Target can save each turn to end the spell.

cards.title: Ray Of Frost
cards.description: Ray of Frost: Ranged spell attack deals 1d8 cold damage, lowers target's speed by 10 ft until your next turn. Damage increases at 5th (2d8), 11th (3d8), and 17th (4d8) levels.

cards.title: Regenerate
cards.description: Heal: Creature regains 4d8 + 15 HP; regains 1 HP/turn. Limbs restored in 2 mins. Holding severed part to stump instantly knits it.

cards.title: Reincarnate
cards.description: "Reincarnate" revives a dead humanoid within 10 days, creating a new adult body for their soul. The spell changes the creature's race based on a d100 roll or GM choice. The revived creature retains memories and abilities but adopts the new racial traits.

cards.title: Remove Curse
cards.description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end. If the object is a cursed magic item, its curse remains, but the spell breaks its owner's attunement to the object so it can be removed or discarded.

cards.title: Resilient Sphere
cards.description: "Cast an immobile sphere around a creature or object, blocking all physical objects, energy, spells, or attacks. The encased target can't be harmed from inside or outside, can breathe, and moves with effort. Disintegrate spell destroys the sphere."

cards.title: Resistance
cards.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the saving throw. The spell then ends.

cards.title: Resurrection
cards.description: Revivify revives a dead creature within a century, healing it fully. It cures poisons/diseases but not magical afflictions. The revived takes a -4 penalty, decreasing after long rests. Casting on a year-old corpse causes exhaustion.

cards.title: Reverse Gravity
cards.description: Reverse Gravity: Create a 50-ft radius, 100-ft high cylinder of reversed gravity. Creatures and objects fall upward, save to grab onto something. They hit ceilings if encountered. At the end, they fall back down.

cards.title: Revivify
cards.description: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.

cards.title: Rope Trick
cards.description: Create a 60-foot rope leading to an extradimensional space for up to 8 Medium creatures. The rope can be pulled in, preventing attacks and spells from passing through, but allows viewing through a window. All contents drop out when the spell ends.

cards.title: Sacred Flame
cards.description: Create Bonfire: 60ft range, Dex save or 1d8 radiant damage. No cover benefits. Damage increases with levels: 5th (2d8), 11th (3d8), 17th (4d8).

cards.title: Sanctuary
cards.description: Warding creates a protective shield around a creature, forcing attackers to make a wisdom saving throw before targeting it. On a fail, they must choose a new target or lose the attack/spell. Area effects can bypass the shield, and it ends if the warded creature attacks or affects an enemy.

cards.title: Scorching Ray
cards.description: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several. Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage.

cards.title: Scrying
cards.description: "Cast this spell to observe a chosen creature or location within 10 feet. Target makes a Wisdom save based on familiarity and connection. On a fail, create an invisible sensor to see and hear target. Can't be cast on same target for 24 hours if save succeeds."

cards.title: Secret Chest
cards.description: "Leomund's Secret Chest" hides a chest and its contents on the Ethereal Plane, retrievable with an action and a miniature replica. The chest holds up to 12 cubic feet, can be recalled within 5 feet, and sent back. After 60 days, a 5% daily chance ends the effect.

cards.title: See Invisibility
cards.description: For the duration of the spell, you see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible, and you can see through Ethereal. The ethereal objects and creatures appear ghostly translucent.

cards.title: Seeming
cards.description: Disguise Self: Change appearance of creatures within range with illusory form, save for unwilling targets. Can alter physical appearance, clothing, and equipment within 1 ft. Lasts until dismissed. Illusions fail under physical inspection.

cards.title: Sending
cards.description: Send a 25-word message to a known creature, who hears and can reply telepathically. Works across any distance or planes, with a 5% failure chance across different planes.

cards.title: Sequester
cards.description: "Cast this spell to make a willing creature or object invisible and undetectable by divination spells or scrying. If a creature, it enters suspended animation, not aging. Set a condition for the spell to end, like "in 1,000 years" or "when the tarrasque awakens." Ends if target takes damage."

cards.title: Shapechange
cards.description: You transform into a creature of equal or lower challenge rating, keeping your alignment and mental stats. Retain your skills and saving throws, adopting those of the new form. Use the creature's HP and Hit Dice. Your class features remain, but can't use legendary or lair actions. You can speak a...

cards.title: Shatter
cards.description: Shatter: A loud noise in a 10-ft radius deals 3d8 thunder damage. Con save for half. Inorganic creatures have disadvantage. Items in the area can also be damaged.

cards.title: Shield
cards.description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

cards.title: Shield Of Faith
cards.description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

cards.title: Shillelagh
cards.description: Imbue club or quarterstaff with nature's power, using spellcasting ability for attack and damage rolls, changing damage die to d8, and making it magical. Ends if recast or weapon is released.

cards.title: Shocking Grasp
cards.description: Shocking Grasp: Melee spell attack, advantage vs. metal armor. Hit deals 1d8 lightning damage, prevents reactions until next turn. Damage increases at 5th, 11th, and 17th levels.

cards.title: Silence
cards.description: Create a silent 20-ft sphere where no sound can pass through. Inside, creatures are immune to thunder damage, deafened, and unable to cast spells with verbal components.

cards.title: Silent Image
cards.description: You create a visual illusion within a 15-foot cube that can be moved with an action. It lacks other sensory effects and can be detected with an Intelligence check. Interacting physically reveals it as an illusion.

cards.title: Simulacrum
cards.description: Create a semi-real ice or snow duplicate of a beast or humanoid with half HP, no equipment, and full stats. It obeys your commands, but can't learn, level up, or regain spell slots. Repair it for 100 gp per HP. Lasts until 0 HP, then melts. Casting again destroys current duplicates.

cards.title: Sleep
cards.description: Slumber spell affects creatures within 20 ft of a point chosen, in ascending order of their HP. Roll 5d8 to determine total HP affected. Sleep ends if damaged or shaken awake. Undead and charm-immune creatures are unaffected.

cards.title: Sleet Storm
cards.description: Create a 20-foot-tall cylinder of freezing rain and sleet in a 40-foot radius. Area is heavily obscured, flames are doused, ground becomes difficult terrain. Creatures entering or starting turn must save or fall prone; concentration checks for creatures in area.

cards.title: Slow
cards.description: Time Stop alters time around up to six creatures in a 40-ft cube. Targets make a wisdom save or are affected: speed halved, -2 penalty to AC and dex saves, no reactions, limited actions, 1 attack per turn, delayed casting. Wisdom save at end of turn to end effect.

cards.title: Spare The Dying
cards.description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

cards.title: Speak With Animals
cards.description: Speak with Animals: Gain ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts. Beasts can provide info on nearby locations and monsters. Can persuade a beast to perform small favor.

cards.title: Speak With Dead
cards.description: "Speak with Dead" grants life-like intelligence to a non-undead corpse, allowing it to answer up to five questions known in life, speaking in languages known. Answers may be brief or cryptic, with no obligation for truthfulness towards hostile questioners or recognized enemies. The spell doesn't...

cards.title: Speak With Plants
cards.description: Animate Plants: Give sentience to plants within 30 ft, allowing communication and simple commands. Question plants for area info, alter terrain, and have plants perform tasks. Can communicate with plant creatures. Can release restrained creatures from Entangle spell.

cards.title: Spider Climb
cards.description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free. The target also gains a climbing speed equal to its walking speed.

cards.title: Spike Growth
cards.description: Entangle foes in a 20-ft radius with spikes and thorns, dealing 2d4 piercing damage for every 5 ft moved in the area. Difficult terrain. Camouflaged but can be perceived with a check.

cards.title: Spirit Guardians
cards.description: Summon spirits to protect you in a 15ft radius. Designate creatures to be unaffected. Creatures in the area have halved speed, must make a Wis save, taking 3d8 radiant/necrotic damage on fail. Spectral appearance varies based on alignment.

cards.title: Spiritual Weapon
cards.description: Create a spectral floating weapon lasting until recast. Make melee spell attacks dealing 1d8 + spellcasting mod force damage. As a bonus action, move the weapon 20 ft and repeat the attack. Customizable form; deities' clerics mimic associated weapons.

cards.title: Stinking Cloud
cards.description: Create a 20-ft radius sphere of yellow gas, heavily obscuring the area and causing creatures inside to make a Con save at the start of their turn. Failed saves make creatures spend their action retching. Wind can disperse the cloud.

cards.title: Stone Shape
cards.description: With this spell, you can touch a stone object or section and reshape it into any form you desire, such as a weapon, passage, or door. The object can have up to two hinges and a latch, but intricate details are limited.

cards.title: Stoneskin
cards.description: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. Until the spell ends, the target has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

cards.title: Storm Of Vengeance
cards.description: Conjure a storm cloud above a point within 5,000 ft, creating a 360-ft radius storm. Creatures under it make con saves to avoid deafening and taking 2d6 thunder damage. Rounds trigger additional effects: acid rain, lightning bolts, hail, cold damage, difficult terrain, and heavily obscured area.

cards.title: Suggestion
cards.description: Influence a creature by suggesting a reasonable course of action. If they fail a Wisdom save, they follow the suggestion for the spell's duration, unless it's obviously harmful. The spell ends if they are harmed or the task is completed before the duration ends.

cards.title: Sunbeam
cards.description: Fires a 60-foot line of light, forcing a Constitution save. Failed save deals 6d8 radiant damage and blinds till caster's next turn. Undead and oozes have disadvantage. Can be used to create new lines. Hand emits bright light.

cards.title: Sunburst
cards.description: "Sunburst" creates blinding sunlight in a 60-foot radius, dealing 12d6 radiant damage and causing blindness for 1 minute on a failed save. Undead and oozes have disadvantage. Blinded creatures can save each turn to end the condition. The spell dispels darkness.

cards.title: Symbol
cards.description: Glyph of Warding inscribes a hidden glyph on a surface or object with a chosen trigger. Upon activation, it emits light and targets creatures within a 60-ft radius with effects like death, discord, fear, hopelessness, insanity, pain, sleep, or stunning, each requiring a specific saving throw and...

cards.title: Telekinesis
cards.description: Telekinesis spell allows you to move creatures or objects with your mind. You can move Huge or smaller creatures up to 30 feet and restrain them, or move objects up to 1,000 pounds. You can manipulate objects with precision for various tasks.

cards.title: Telepathic Bond
cards.description: Forge a telepathic link among up to eight willing creatures within range, allowing them to communicate regardless of language or distance. Intelligence score must be 3 or higher; doesn't work across planes.

cards.title: Teleport
cards.description: Teleport instantly transports up to 8 willing creatures or an object to a known destination on the same plane. Success is based on familiarity, with outcomes ranging from precise arrival to mishap, off-target, or to a similar area. Mishaps can cause force damage and reroll destination.

cards.title: Teleportation Circle
cards.description: Create a temporary teleportation circle linking to a known permanent circle on the same plane. Creatures entering the circle appear near the destination circle. Learn two sigil sequences initially and more through adventures. With daily casting in one spot for a year, create a permanent circle.

cards.title: Thaumaturgy
cards.description: Manifest a minor wonder within range: amplify voice, manipulate flames, tremors, create sounds, open/close doors, change eye appearance. Up to 3 effects can be active for 1 minute, dismiss as an action.

cards.title: Thunderwave
cards.description: Thunderwave: A 15-ft cube centered on you forces creatures to make a con save. Fail takes 2d8 thunder dmg, is pushed 10 ft. Success takes half dmg, no push. Unsecured objects are pushed 10 ft, and a loud boom is heard 300 ft away.

cards.title: Time Stop
cards.description: Time stops for others as you act freely for 1d4+1 turns. Your actions or effects on creatures end the spell. Stay within 1,000 feet of the casting spot.

cards.title: Tiny Hut
cards.description: Creates a 10ft-radius immobile dome around you, fitting 9 Medium creatures. Blocks passage to others, magic, & weather. Interior lighting control. Transparent inside, opaque outside.

cards.title: Tongues
cards.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears. Moreover, when the target speaks, any creature that knows at least one language and can hear the target understands what it says.

cards.title: Transport Via Plants
cards.description: Transport via Plants links a Large+ inanimate plant to another on the same plane, requiring prior contact. Lasting until dispelled, creatures can teleport between the plants using 5 ft. of movement.

cards.title: Tree Stride
cards.description: Transport via Plants: Enter a tree and move to another of the same kind within 500 ft. Spend 5 ft. to enter, know locations of same trees, exit within 5 ft. of chosen tree using 5 ft. of movement. Once per round, must end turn outside a tree.

cards.title: True Polymorph
cards.description: Polymorph spell transforms a creature into another creature or object, or an object into a creature. Lasts until dispelled or target dies. The target's new form's stats replace its own. Unwilling targets can save. Object to creature must be CR 9 or lower. Object to creature actions are controlled...

cards.title: True Resurrection
