cards.description: Revivify: Revives a creature dead for under 200 years, healing fully and restoring missing parts. Requires willing soul. Also cures poison, disease, and curses. Can create a new body if needed, placing creature near caster.

cards.title: True Seeing
cards.description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are. For the duration, the creature has truesight, notices secret doors hidden by magic, and can see into the Ethereal Plane, all out to a range of 120 feet.

cards.title: True Strike
cards.description: You extend your hand and point a finger at a target in range. Your magic grants you a brief insight into the target's defenses. On your next turn, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against the target, provided that this spell hasn't ended.

cards.title: Unseen Servant
cards.description: Unseen Servant creates an invisible, mindless force that follows simple commands for tasks like fetching, cleaning, or serving. It has 1 HP, AC 10, Strength 2, and can't attack. You can command it to move 15 ft and interact with objects as a bonus action. If it goes beyond 60 ft from you or hits 0

cards.title: Vampiric Touch
cards.description: With a touch, siphon life force from a creature within reach, dealing 3d6 necrotic damage and healing for half the damage dealt. Can be used each turn as an action until the spell ends.

cards.title: Vicious Mockery
cards.description: Vicious Mockery: Enchanting insults deal 1d4 psychic damage & impose disadvantage on target's next attack roll if it fails a wisdom save. Damage increases with levels: 2d4 at 5th, 3d4 at 11th, 4d4 at 17th.

cards.title: Wall Of Fire
cards.description: Create a 60ft long, 20ft high, 1ft thick wall of fire or a 20ft diameter, 20ft high ring on a surface. Creatures in range must save or take 5d8 fire damage. One side deals damage to those near it.

cards.title: Wall Of Force
cards.description: Create invisible, indestructible 10ft-radius sphere or 10ft-by-10ft panels wall, with various orientations. Lasts until dispelled. Pushes creatures aside, blocks passage, and extends to Ethereal Plane. Disintegrate spell destroys it instantly.

cards.title: Wall Of Ice
cards.description: Create a 10-foot radius wall of ice that can be a dome, sphere, or flat surface. Creatures caught in it take 10d6 cold damage upon failing a Dex save. The wall has AC 12, 30 HP per 10-ft section, and is vulnerable to fire. Destroyed sections create frigid air, dealing 5d6 cold damage

cards.title: Wall Of Stone
cards.description: Create a nonmagical wall of solid stone within range, with 10 panels of 10x10 feet or 10x20 feet. Creatures pushed if in its space, can save to escape enclosure. Wall can be shaped, bridging gaps, can't pass through creatures or objects. Panels have AC 15, 30 HP per inch. Concentration makes it

cards.title: Wall Of Thorns
cards.description: Create a 60-ft long, 10-ft high, 5-ft thick wall of thorny brush or a 20-ft diameter, 20-ft high circle. Deals 7d8 piercing damage to creatures inside on casting and 7d8 slashing damage when they enter or end turn in it. Difficult terrain, 4 ft of movement for every 1

cards.title: Warding Bond
cards.description: Warding Bond: Touch a willing creature to grant +1 AC, saving throw bonus, and damage resistance, but you take damage when the target does. Ends if separated by >60ft, if recast on either, or if caster drops to 0 HP. Can be dismissed.

cards.title: Water Breathing
cards.description: This spell gives a maximum of ten willing creatures within range and you can see, the ability to breathe underwater until the end of its term. Affected creatures also retain their normal breathing pattern.

cards.title: Water Walk
cards.description: Grant up to 10 creatures the ability to move on liquid surfaces as if solid ground. Submerged targets rise to the surface at 60 ft per round. Crossing lava still deals damage from heat.

cards.title: Web
cards.description: Conjure sticky web in a 20-foot cube. Difficult terrain, lightly obscures. Creatures must save or be restrained. Can break free with Strength check. Flammable, burns for 2d4 fire damage.

cards.title: Weird
cards.description: "Phantasmal Horror" creates illusory creatures in the minds of a group within 30 feet, causing fear. Frightened creatures take 4d10 psychic damage at the start of their turns unless they pass a wisdom saving throw, which also ends the spell for them.

cards.title: Wind Walk
cards.description: "Cast Gaseous Form on up to ten creatures to give them flying speed of 300 ft, resistance to nonmagical weapon damage, and cloud-like appearance. Actions limited to Dash or reverting to normal form, taking 1 min. Ending spell causes gradual descent to land safely if flying."

cards.title: Wind Wall
cards.description: Create a 50ft long, 15ft high, 1ft thick wall of wind. Creatures in area make a Str save, taking 3d8 bludgeoning on fail, half on success. Blocks gases, deflects projectiles, stops flying creatures, and lifts lightweight objects.

cards.title: Wish
cards.description: Wish is a powerful spell allowing you to duplicate spells, create objects, heal creatures, grant resistances or immunities, force rerolls, and make specific wishes. However, using it beyond spell duplication drains you, causing damage, lowering Strength, and potentially preventing future use. Be...

cards.title: Word Of Recall
cards.description: Teleport yourself and up to five creatures to a sanctuary. Designate the sanctuary at a location linked to your deity. If not designated, spell fails.

cards.title: Zone Of Truth
cards.description: Create a 15-ft radius Zone of Truth where creatures must make a Charisma saving throw upon entering or starting their turn. Fail = can't speak lies, you know if they pass/fail. Creatures can avoid questions requiring lies.
